apiDescription: An iterator over a slice in (non-overlapping) mutable chunks (chunk_size elements at a time). When the slice len is not evenly divided by the chunk size, the last slice of the iteration will be the remainder.
This struct is created by the chunks_mut method on slices.

trait implementations.name: impl<'a, T> std::iter::Iterator for std::slice::ChunksMut<'a, T>
impl<'a, T> std::iter::DoubleEndedIterator for std::slice::ChunksMut<'a, T>
impl<'a, T> std::iter::TrustedLen for std::slice::ChunksMut<'a, T>
impl<'a, T> std::fmt::Debug for std::slice::ChunksMut<'a, T> where T: 'a + std::fmt::Debug
impl<'a, T> std::iter::ExactSizeIterator for std::slice::ChunksMut<'a, T>
impl<'a, T> std::iter::FusedIterator for std::slice::ChunksMut<'a, T>
impl<'a, T> std::marker::Send for std::slice::ChunksMut<'a, T> where T: std::marker::Send
impl<'a, T> std::marker::Sync for std::slice::ChunksMut<'a, T> where T: std::marker::Sync
